synopsis: The jig is up - Kanata saw Rio coming out of the distillery, and now she won't rest until she knows what's going on! Filicia proposes a little game, and if Kanata wins, they'll tell her everything. But of course, Filicia still has an ace up her sleeve...

title.jp: Episode 13 – Special Episode - The Horizon of Dreams

synopsis: Given a letter sent to Rio from the Emperor, Kanata searches the city and ponders a question asked by Mishio of what her dreams of the future are.
